document.discussion_title: How Middle East Film & Comic Con began
document.topic_text: As Middle East Film & Comic Con prepares to celebrate its fifth anniversary this weekend, we caught up with co-founder Arafat Ali Khan to get the story so far. In the beginning "It was one of those moments where Ben [ Caddy ,
